name: Warlock's Revenge
description:
Warlock's Revenge is a first-person hack-'n-slash made for the 2017 Alpha Jam. The game is made in Unity. There are a variety of free assets used in the game listed below.

Use the WASD keys to move and the mouse to aim. Attack with the left mouse button. Hitting consecutive attacks will charge the combo meter. When your combo meter is full, use the right mouse button to unleash a special attack that drains health from your enemies!

  • CC-BY-SA 3.0 skull model and textures by Vrav, 2012.(https://opengameart.org/content/old-skull)
  • https://opengameart.org/content/modular-medieval-b...
  • https://opengameart.org/content/skull-prop
  • https://opengameart.org/content/shiny-hud
